location_working: daily from 10.00 a.m. to 09.00 p.m. in the warm season
location_working_cold: from 10.00 a.m. to 06.00 p.m. in the cold season
location_description: An exciting adventure for children and adults. Breath-taking 'tubing' promises a lot of fun, due to its special cover you will be enjoying a descent with the wind in your hair at any time of the year.
